alert.note: Alert for Austin; Brazos; Burleson; Colorado; Grimes; Madison; Waller; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 12:43AM CDT until May 25 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Colorado County in southeastern Texas... Northern Austin County in southeastern Texas... Grimes County in southeastern Texas... Burleson County in southeastern Texas... Brazos County in southeastern Texas... Washington County in southeastern Texas... Southwestern Madison County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Waller County in southeastern Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1242 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Hearne to 9 miles northeast of Caldwell to 6 miles north of Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway to 6 miles northwest of Round Top to near Cistern, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... College Station, Bryan, Brenham, Navasota, Hempstead, Bellville, Columbus, Washington, Weimar, Somerville, Snook, Bedias, Kurten, Industry, Burton, Wixon Valley, Millican, Anderson, Lake Somerville Dam and Kyle Field. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Brazos; Burleson; Colorado; Grimes; Madison; Waller; Washington
